title: Harassment
body:
To Whom It May Concern
My Summoner's name is Pensfan131
I have had a player on my friend list in the past few days harassing me about buying him a skin
I'm normally not one to complain about much or name and shame but if he's doing it to me he's probably doing it to others
For the good of the community can the player in question (the summoner name is _Name Removed_) either have his account suspended or terminated
This type of behaviour is unacceptable and should be given a strong punishment
Thanks guys/girls

replies.body:
Name and shame is not allowed, his name will be removed by a mod if you don't do it before then.

Just remove the player from friendslist and add them to blocklist.
It's not rocket surgery.

(addidng them to blocklist automatically removes them from friends iirc)

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=jBU7pQN0,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-09-05T06:55:50.169+0000)
>
> Whats rocket surgery?

I also ponder this

with due respect though,
there is clearly an issue about toxicity in the lol community
i know friends that don't play it due to that exact problem
I'm lucky with the fact that i play with a group of ppl that don't rage at each other or at the opposition
by having players being harassed over chat is not on
if u delete and block the player, the issue will still be there
he will still do the same thing to others
ignoring the problem isn't gonna fix it
oh grow up, you can block, everyone else can block. stop seeking censorship you fascist
its not fascism to ask in a polite manner to stop being harassed for money is it?

Everything you've said there is pretty accurate, which is why I would recommend you send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) directly to **Riot** instead of reporting here. 

There are no **Rioters** who go on the boards looking to ban people, so most of time no one will even see your post at all, let alone actually punish the player in question.

It's really nice to see more people taking action though :D

Yeah, I'm not normally one to 'dob'
For me I posted it out of sheer frustration
Unfortunately the whole deleting and blocking system does exactly what I stated
There needs to be action
Otherwise there is so many young kids and immature teenagers ruining the experience of being a part of the lol community
With that being through toxicity in game and in client
I have known a lot people in the past leave not because they didn't enjoy the game
But for the toxic culture of it which is really sad
Lol should be an inclusive community, not an exclusive one

Action would be taken (if necessary) through the post-game report system and a **Riot** support ticket. The only place where no action will be taken is actually the boards.

That's why I strongly advise everyone to report through those means :)

People say "it's not rocket science" or "it's not brain surgery".
"It's not rocket surgery" is a 'joke' combining the two.
I'm surprised you've never heard (or read) that before.
